name: Line Break
description:
Imagine going for a walk in a story.  Each line of text is a path to walk on, and broken sentences turn into staircases and platforms. 

Line Break is a platformer made of text snippets.

 A fragmented narrative 

                                                     for you to shape and explore. 

                                                                                                          Depending on where you fall, walk or jump, you 

                         will  experience a different story.

 

Each movement is a choice, 

                                                              and some choices matter more than others.
